name: OD27_5dim_automation
title: OD27 fork of 5Dim's mod - New Automatization
author: 5Dim
description:
Automation for OD27 fork of 5Dim's mod
Add a lot of new tiers oil refineries, new tiers of assembling machine, chemical plants and laboratories
This mod include:
- 10 tiers of assembling machines
- 10 tiers of chemical plants
- 10 tiers of oil refineries
- 10 tiers of laboratories
